briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Subjects With Genotype 1 Infection
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 Infection (ENDURANCE-1)
summary: This study seeks to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in participants with Genotype 1 hepatitis C virus infection without cirrhosis

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks Post-treatment (SVR12) in Mono-infected Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 (HCV GT1), Direct-acting Antiviral Agent (DAA) Na√Øve Participants in the 12-Week Treatment Arm
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the last actual dose of study drug
